doc.field: IRANIAN OIL MINISTER DUE IN ALGERIA ON FRIDAY

- Iranian Oil Minister Gholamreza Aqazadeh is expected here on Friday for talks with his Algerian counterpart Belkacem Nabi, the official Algerian news agency APS said today. Aqazadeh, who will be accompanied by a large delegation, will have talks on bilateral relations in the field of energy and exchange views with Algerian officials on the current world energy situation, it said.
